title: Fresh mango cupcakes
ingredients: ['For the cupcakes', '2 fresh mangoes - peeled, stoned and chopped', '2 eggs', '200g caster sugar', '75ml vegetable oil', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon lemon zest', '200g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'For the icing', '175g cream cheese, softened', '30g unsalted butter, softened', '60g icing sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 fresh mango - peeled, stoned and diced']
